item.title: Self mod help?
item.dc:creator: @iamblackdemon iamblackdemon
item.description:
@iamblackdemon wrote:

on my server it is verry limited to be a mod. but you get some cool stuff and everyone gets mod. bit instead of me taking the time to get on and mod every player i got creative. but not realy. ERROR

	if (playerRights == 0)
	{
		sendMessage("Welcome to ElycitpicalScape!");
		sendMessage("Here Is Your Login Payment! 1 GP!");
		addItem(995, 1);
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[p];

		c.playerRights = 1;
		c.savemoreinfo();
		c.savechar();
		c.disconnected = true;
		newWelc();
	}

that is my script.

but i get an error saying:

int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
^
1 error.

is there way way to fix this?

Read full topic
